law.history: Repealed 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 57, effective June 15, 1950. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1948. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 185, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2739o-1. 2739o-2.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Mileage, tag and seat taxes on passenger vehicles operated by common carriers and contract carriers.
